keyMoments.title: Charges Through Marineford Bay
keyMoments.description: Little Oars Jr. begins his desperate charge toward the execution platform to save Ace, throwing a Marine battleship to clear a path and defeating the Giant Squad.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Oars Jr.'s overwhelming strength and his determination to save Ace at any cost.
keyMoments.quote: I just want to save Ace!

keyMoments.title: Receives Devastating Ursus Shock from Kuma
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma unleashes a massive Ursus Shock attack that critically damages Little Oars Jr., shattering his blade and destroying the ice beneath him.
keyMoments.significance: First major blow that stops Oars Jr.'s advance, showing the overwhelming power of the Shichibukai.

keyMoments.title: Remembers Ace's Kindness - The Giant Kasa
keyMoments.description: As he falls from Kuma's attack, Little Oars Jr. remembers when Ace crafted a giant kasa (hat) for him to provide shelter from the sun, rain, and snow.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals the deep bond between Ace and Oars Jr., explaining his motivation for risking everything to save his friend.

keyMoments.title: Stands Back Up Despite Mortal Wounds
keyMoments.description: Surprising all the Marines, Little Oars Jr. rises again after Kuma's devastating attack, determined to save Ace and take down at least one Shichibukai.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the unbreakable bonds of friendship and determination that define One Piece characters.

keyMoments.title: Leg Severed by Doflamingo
keyMoments.description: Donquixote Doflamingo uses his string powers to sever Little Oars Jr.'s right leg, critically wounding the giant.
keyMoments.significance: A brutal and devastating moment that demonstrates Doflamingo's ruthless nature and mysterious powers.

keyMoments.title: Impaled by Gecko Moria's Tsuno-Tokage
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria finishes off Little Oars Jr. by impaling him with his Shadow Horn Spears technique, bringing down the giant as he reaches for Ace.
keyMoments.significance: The final blow that ends Oars Jr.'s heroic charge, marking one of the most tragic moments in the Marineford Arc.

relationships.description: Little Oars Jr. has a deep friendship with Ace, who showed him kindness by crafting a giant kasa to protect him from the elements.

evolutionMoments.description: Flashback reveals Ace crafted a giant kasa for Little Oars Jr., establishing their strong bond of friendship.

relationships.description: Little Oars Jr. serves as an allied captain under Whitebeard's command and participates in the war to save Ace.

reveals.information: Deep friendship with Ace established through the kasa gift
Ace crafted a giant kasa for Oars Jr. in Wano Country to protect him from sun, rain, and snow

name.japanese: ポートガス・D・エース

keyMoments.title: Flashback - Crafting Kasa for Little Oars Jr.
keyMoments.description: Flashback reveals Ace learned to make a traditional kasa in Wano Country and crafted a giant one for Little Oars Jr., burning the first two attempts due to his fire powers before succeeding on the third try.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Ace's kindness and the friendships he formed during his journeys, reinforcing why so many are willing to risk everything to save him.

reveals.information: Ace learned to make traditional kasa in Wano Country
Befriended Little Oars Jr. and crafted a giant kasa for him

name.japanese: バーソロミュー・くま

keyMoments.title: Unleashes Devastating Ursus Shock
keyMoments.description: Bartholomew Kuma unleashes a massive Ursus Shock attack that creates an enormous paw-shaped explosion, critically damaging Little Oars Jr. and causing massive destruction to Marineford Bay.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the full devastating power of Kuma's Nikyu Nikyu no Mi abilities and establishes him as one of the most dangerous Shichibukai.

abilities.description: Kuma creates an enormous paw bubble between his outstretched arms, compresses air by repelling it repeatedly with his paws, then launches it as a bomb that creates a massive paw-shaped explosion.

reveals.information: Full power of Ursus Shock technique demonstrated in large-scale battle

name.japanese: ドンキホーテ・ドフラミンゴ

keyMoments.title: Severs Little Oars Jr.'s Leg with String Powers
keyMoments.description: Doflamingo uses his Ito Ito no Mi powers to sever Little Oars Jr.'s right leg with invisible strings, demonstrating the cutting ability of his Devil Fruit for the first time.
keyMoments.significance: First clear demonstration of Doflamingo's ability to cut through massive objects with his strings, establishing his ruthless fighting style and mysterious powers.

abilities.description: Doflamingo uses his nearly invisible strings to cut through objects and body parts with precision, demonstrated by severing Little Oars Jr.'s massive leg.

reveals.information: Can use strings to cut through massive objects and body parts

keyMoments.title: Finishes Oars Jr. with Tsuno-Tokage
keyMoments.description: Gecko Moria, furious at Doflamingo for damaging his future zombie, impales Little Oars Jr. with his Tsuno-Tokage (Shadow Horn Spears) technique, finally bringing down the giant.
keyMoments.significance: Delivers the final blow to Little Oars Jr., demonstrating Moria's greed and cruelty as he views the giant only as a future addition to his zombie army.

abilities.description: Moria creates shadow spears in the shape of horns that impale opponents, demonstrated by delivering the finishing blow to Little Oars Jr.

reveals.information: Wants to turn Little Oars Jr. into a zombie for his army

keyMoments.title: Attacks Both Pirates and Marines
keyMoments.description: Boa Hancock enters the battle and attacks both pirates and marines indiscriminately, declaring that all men except Luffy are her enemies.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Hancock's true allegiance during the war and her independence from Marine control, foreshadowing her eventual assistance to Luffy.

reveals.information: Attacks both sides during battle, showing loyalty only to Luffy
